shootingActionSequence.name: Lateral (virtual, virtual), static (GPS, GPS), fly through (virtual, none).

shootingRole.name: LATERAL
shootingRole.params: {"y_0":{"value":9,"description":"Y-axis displacement (meters)"},"z_0":{"value":6,"description":"Z-axis displacement (meters)"},"image":"lateral.png","description":"The drone moves alongside the target."}

shootingRole.params: {"z_0":{"value":6,"description":"Z-axis displacement (meters)"},"image":"static.png","description":"The drone remains stationary, with the camera being stationary or moving."}

shootingRole.name: FLY_THROUGH
shootingRole.params: {"z_0":{"value":6,"description":"Z-axis displacement (meters)"},"image":"fly-through.png","description":"The drone flies through the scene (normally) with a constant speed following a pre-programmed path with different camera movement."}

shootingActionSequence.name: Chase (virtual, virtual), establish (GPS, GPS), elevator (GPS, GPS), fly through (virtual, none).

shootingRole.name: CHASE
shootingRole.params: {"x_e":{"value":-9,"description":"X-axis end (meters)"},"x_s":{"value":-9,"description":"X-axis start (meters)"},"z_0":{"value":9,"description":"Z-axis displacement (meters)"},"image":"chase.png","description":"The drone chases the target from behind, with the distance between them typically decreasing or remaining constant."}

targetIdentifier.name: VIRTUAL
targetIdentifier.description: Track a shooting target following the reference trajectory

shootingRole.name: ESTABLISH
shootingRole.params: {"x_e":{"value":-6,"description":"X-axis end (meters)"},"x_s":{"value":-12,"description":"X-axis start (meters)"},"z_e":{"value":4,"description":"Z-axis end (meters)"},"z_s":{"value":9,"description":"Z-axis start (meters)"},"image":"establish.png","description":"The drone (normally) moves closer to the target"}

shootingActionSequence.name: Flyby (virtual, virtual), orbit (virtual, GPS), lead (GPS, GPS), orbit (GPS, virtual), fly through (virtual, none).

shootingRole.name: FLYBY
shootingRole.params: {"x_e":{"value":9,"description":"X-axis end (meters)"},"x_s":{"value":-9,"description":"X-axis start (meters)"},"y_0":{"value":-9,"description":"Y-axis displacement (meters)"},"z_0":{"value":3,"description":"Z-axis displacement (meters)"},"image":"flyby.png","description":"The drone flies past the target (offset from the target trajectory) in a straight line, normally overtaking the target, with camera tracking as it does so."}

targetIdentifier.name: VIRTUAL
targetIdentifier.description: Track a shooting target following the reference trajectory

shootingRole.name: ORBIT
shootingRole.params: {"r_0":{"value":12.73,"description":"Radius of the circle (meters)"},"z_0":{"value":3,"description":"Z-axis displacement (meters)"},"image":"orbit.png","azimuth_s":{"value":-0.785398163,"description":"Drone position angle (radians)"},"description":"The drone flies around the target in a circle, centred at the target.","azimuth_speed":{"value":-0.037399913,"description":"Drone angular speed (rad/s)"}}
